title: Ticket #2454: Daemon Core Handler Statistics need better names
description: Daemon Core statistics introduced in #2354 include a counter and runtime timer per daemon-core callback. These are given names derived from the handler_descrip string passed to Daemon Core when the handler is registered. Now that these strings are being made public, we should review and possilbly revise these strings. It appears that several command handlers use a default string of "DC Command Handler", these should be given unique names.
creator: johnkn
